name: Platform Administration
title: Platform Administration
body:
Overview

This article provides an overview of the Platform Administration features in the EFS system, including the System, Support, and User menus, and language settings.

 

Information

The Platform Administration section covers the various administrative tools and options available to users in the EFS system, focusing on the menu bar located in the upper right corner of the interface.

 

  • Menu Bar Overview
  • System Menu
  • Support Menu
  • Profile Menu

 

Menu Bar Overview

The menu bar in the upper right corner of the EFS interface contains three drop-down menus: System, Support, and User. Additionally, you can find the Language button to switch your preferred display language.

 

System Menu

The System menu provides access to the following items:

  • Users
  • Libraries
  • Options

For more detailed information about the System menu, please refer to the dedicated System documentation.

 

Support Menu

The Support menu offers access to various resources and features:

  • Video tutorials
  • Online Documentation
  • Support contact option
  • Feedback feature
  • Information on data protection and GDPR

Profile Menu

The Profile menu allows users to manage their account and personal settings. Through this menu, you can:

  • Edit your account information
  • Adjust personal settings
  • Log out of the system

For more information about the Profile menu, please consult the dedicated Profile documentation.

 

FAQ

How do I change the display language?

To change the display language, click on the Language button in the upper right corner of the interface and select your preferred language from the available options.

 

What can I do in the System menu?

The System menu allows you to manage Users, Libraries, and Options within the EFS platform. For more detailed information, please refer to the System documentation.
